snippet.title: Heartseeker - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Embody the Heartseeker blade in this fast-paced precision clicking platformer. Get to the heart of the Living Dungeon and slay the final heart to save existence!

The game will be released for Windows on Steam, October 5th, 2021:

STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1729160/Heartseeker/

TWITTER:
https://twitter.com/HeartSeekerGame

SOUNDTRACK:
https://soundcloud.com/master-belvedere/sets/heartseeker-soundtrack

A collaboration between:
Chris Farina:  https://twitter.com/Vestboy_Myst
Michael Perrotta:  https://twitter.com/MCPerrotta
Nick Zonak: https://twitter.com/NickZonak
